name: UIPointerInteractionDelegate
desc: An interface for handling pointer movements within the interaction's view.

items.name: func pointerInteraction(UIPointerInteraction, regionFor: UIPointerRegionRequest, defaultRegion: UIPointerRegion) -> UIPointerRegion?
items.desc: Asks the delegate for a region as the pointer moves within the interaction's view.

items.name: func pointerInteraction(UIPointerInteraction, styleFor: UIPointerRegion) -> UIPointerStyle?
items.desc: Asks the delegate for a pointer style after an interaction receives a new region.

items.name: func pointerInteraction(UIPointerInteraction, willEnter: UIPointerRegion, animator: UIPointerInteractionAnimating)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when the pointer enters a given region.

items.name: func pointerInteraction(UIPointerInteraction, willExit: UIPointerRegion, animator: UIPointerInteractionAnimating)
items.desc: Informs the delegate when the pointer exits a given region.
